other_title: Sheevas 1-2-3 Il Dio Perduto di Ikaros (Italian)
plot: Ruthless sorcerer Chivas Scotch is hired by a count named Cuttlefish to destroy an evil monster attacking a nearby village. But things go awry when Chivas fails to destroy the monster and he's forced to transfer his spirit in the body of his beautiful servant Gin Fizz.
ending_theme: "My First Wonder Sensation" by Anri Minowa
